pages.text: $(li)The Wraith is an aggresive creature that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/soul_sand_valley)Soul Sand Valley$(/l).$(br)$(li)It attacks like a common $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombie$(/l), but this one inflicts $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/slowness)Slowness$(/l) and jump back upon dealing damage.$(br)$(li)It always drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/soul_bead)Soul Bead$(/l) on death.
